packages.name: M4G BLE Bridge (Standalone)
packages.description: Single keyboard mode - USB to Bluetooth bridge for one keyboard. This is the original firmware for single keyboard setups.

packages.name: M4G BLE Bridge (Split - LEFT Side)
packages.description: Split keyboard LEFT board - Connects to left keyboard via USB, receives from right board via 2.4GHz ESP-NOW, and transmits combined output to computer via Bluetooth. Flash this to the board that will be paired with your computer.

packages.name: M4G BLE Bridge (Split - RIGHT Side)
packages.description: Split keyboard RIGHT board - Connects to right keyboard via USB and transmits wirelessly to left board via 2.4GHz ESP-NOW. No Bluetooth. Flash this to the board that will connect to your right keyboard half.
